title: Coordinator, Production Finance - Nordics
overview: The Coordinator, Production Finance - Nordics position at Netflix in Stockholm provides comprehensive daily support for the Production Finance team, including processing accounts payables, tracking project cash forecasting and funding, maintaining internal reporting tools, optimizing workflows, facilitating communication with external partners, and informing cross-functional teams with project updates.
